code: import React from"react";import Login from"./Login";import{compose}from"redux";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{withAuthRedirect}from"../../hoc/withAuthRedirect";import{addDescription,isUserLogged,updateLogin as _updateLogin,updatePassword as _updatePassword}from"../../redux/auth-reducer";var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{updatePassword:function updatePassword(password){dispatch(_updatePassword(password));},updateLogin:function updateLogin(login){dispatch(_updateLogin(login));},updateToggle:function updateToggle(bool){dispatch(isUserLogged(bool));},updateDescription:function updateDescription(info){dispatch(addDescription(info));}};};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{authPage:state.authPage};};export default compose(connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps),withAuthRedirect)(Login);
